main event: A witness observed a luminous object while driving in Kettering, Ohio on January 5, 1958, noting its dim green left side and bright white light on the right.
interesting points: The object had red and green flashing lights,The observation lasted for 6 minutes,The witness described the object as similar to an aircraft collision light,The report indicates a probable aircraft classification,The witness's attention was caught by the object's rapid upward movement.
sighted object: one luminous object in the sky
witness description: A motor engine worker, 37 years old, with approximately 2000 hours of flying time.
